scripts.copy: copyfiles -u 1 src/ui/styles/**/* dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/ui/assets/**/* dist
scripts.pack: mkdir temp-dist && copyfiles -u 1 dist/**/* temp-dist && copy package.json temp-dist && cd temp-dist && npm pack && move *.tgz .. && cd .. && rmdir /S /Q temp-dist
scripts.publish: mkdir temp-dist && copyfiles -u 1 dist/**/* temp-dist && copy package.json temp-dist && cd temp-dist && npm publish && cd .. && rmdir /S /Q temp-dist
